concept.definition: The provider is allowed to practice and admit
The provider is not allowed to practice or admit
concept.display: No Privileges to practice or admit

concept.definition: The provider is not allowed to practice or admit at this time
The provider is allowed to practice only, cannot admit patients
concept.display: Practice Privileges Only (not allowed to admit)

concept.definition: The provider is allowed to practice and admit for a limited time

description: A set of codes that describe the level of authorization given to a provider to practice medicine at an institution.
name: HSPC ProviderPractitioner Privilege

text.div:
HSPC ProviderPractitioner Privilege

A set of codes that describe the level of authorization given to a provider to practice medicine at an institution.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/practitioner-hspc-privilege defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
50453110 Full PrivilegesThe provider is allowed to practice and admit
50453109 No Privileges to practice or admitThe provider is not allowed to practice or admit
50453111 Privileges SuspendedThe provider is not allowed to practice or admit at this time
50453112 Practice Privileges Only (not allowed to admit)The provider is allowed to practice only, cannot admit patients
50450945 Temporary PrivilegesThe provider is allowed to practice and admit for a limited time
